name: On the Hunt (xxstyxx)
description:
On the Hunt is a retro Cyberpunk Shooter made with Easy FPS Editor.

On Planet Gol-Goroth, Police was abandoned and replaced with the Hunters Guild and Laws with a Set of Rules. Rules many People bend and twist. But if someone breaks the Rules its your Job to take him out of the Game.

On the Hunt will be a retro Cyberpunk FPS "Doomlike", with branching Paths and different Endings.

The Visuals take Inspiration from Deux Ex to Mortal Kombat and many other Games/Movies from the late 90s - early 2000s. (with some newer references/eastereggs mixed in)
